com.fraudpointer.api
Class ClientFactory

java.lang.Object
  com.fraudpointer.api.ClientFactory

public class ClientFactory
extends java.lang.Object

This is a helping class that instantiates an object that implements IClient interface.

Use this method to start with FraudPointer API. It will give you an object that properly implements IClient interface.

Method Summary

          Instantiates an object that properly implements IClient interface.

Method Detail

construct

public static IClient construct(java.lang.String baseUrl,
                                java.lang.String apiKey)
Instantiates an object that properly implements IClient interface.

Start your FraudPointer API usage from here. It will give you an instance of an object that properly implements the IClient interface.

Here is an example of usage:

 IClient client = ClientFactory.construct("https://production.fraudpointer.com/api", "111118312453678901abcdef123456789328");

Parameters:
baseUrl - This is the URL of the FraudPointer API Service. It has to have the value: https://production.fraudpointer.com/api
apiKey - This should be the API KEY that corresponds to the domain that you integrate FraudPointer API for. The API KEY is automatically generated when you register an Account in FraudPointer Registration Web Form. Note that your Account in FraudPointer service might have more than one domains registered. You need to provide here the API KEY that corresponds to the domain that you are going to integrate this client with.
Returns:
A valid IClient instantiated object. This is a newly created object to work with the FraudPointer Service.
